mapper.select: SELECT A.ADOC_NO A.ADOC_NAME A.ADOC_CONTENT A.EMP_NO A.DRAFT_DATE A.NOELEC_STATUS FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A RIGHT JOIN DOCAPPROVE D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WEHERE D.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND APPROVE_STATUS != 'R'
SELECT A.ADOC_NO A.ADOC_NAME A.ADOC_CONTENT A.EMP_NO A.DRAFT_DATE A.NOELEC_STATUS FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A RIGHT JOIN DOCCOOP D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WEHERE D.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT A.ADOC_NO A.ADOC_NAME A.ADOC_CONTENT A.EMP_NO A.DRAFT_DATE A.NOELEC_STATUS FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A RIGHT JOIN DOCREFER D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WEHERE D.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT A.ADOC_NO A.ADOC_NAME A.ADOC_CONTENT A.EMP_NO A.DRAFT_DATE A.NOELEC_STATUS FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A RIGHT JOIN DOCREFER D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WEHERE D.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND APPROVE_STATUS = 'R'
SELECT E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , P.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO

mapper.select: SELECT ADOC_NO FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT WHERE ADOC_CONTENT = #{adocContent}
